properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, REF_UNO, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_ID = REF_UNO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
